title: Kimi ni Utsuru Hoshi
description:
4: Nanadome no Gomenne (The Seven Things I'm Sorry For)
Stuttering, recluse Tooru believes he has seven things he's sorry for. His twin brother Satoru knows all but the seventh... the very one that may shatter their way of life.

6: Afuretara Saigo (The Tipping Point)
Segawa and Kousaka have been best friends forever. When Segawa tells Kousaka that he likes men, that doesn't stop them from being friends.... perhaps it's because Kousaka actually loves him. But Segawa is stuck on a man he saw at a gay park...
